item.title: 极简Supervisor
item.description: Supervisor is a client/server system that allows its users to monitor and control a number of processes on UNIX-like operating systems. Supervisor 是比较简单的创建守护进程的工具，支持 linux 和 macOS 这些类 UNIX 系统。 它的优势在于比较轻量、不需要 root 权限、配置
